# Example input file for CP2K
# Line starting with # are comments

# Set some variables for future use
@SET SYSNAME GO_0.25_norandom

# The input is organized in sections, the two main sections are FORCE_EVAL
# which contains the system definition and DFT parameters, and the MOTION
# section, which defines the propagator and the simulation outputs.
&GLOBAL
    PRINT_LEVEL MEDIUM
    PROJECT_NAME ${SYSNAME}
    RUN_TYPE MD
&END GLOBAL

&FORCE_EVAL
    # QS is QuickStep, the name of the DFT module in CP2K
    METHOD  QS
    STRESS_TENSOR  DIAGONAL_ANALYTICAL
    &DFT
        # Path to the data files
        BASIS_SET_FILE_NAME data/BASIS_SET
        BASIS_SET_FILE_NAME data/BASIS_MOLOPT
        POTENTIAL_FILE_NAME data/POTENTIAL
        # Various SCF parameters
        &SCF
            MAX_SCF    500
            EPS_SCF    1e-5
            SCF_GUESS  ATOMIC
            &MIXING  T
                METHOD   PULAY_MIXING
                ALPHA    0.5
                NBUFFER  5
            &END MIXING
            &PRINT
                &RESTART OFF
                &END RESTART
            &END PRINT
            &OT ON
                PRECONDITIONER  FULL_SINGLE_INVERSE
                MINIMIZER       DIIS
            &END OT
        &END SCF
        # Energy grids and corresponding cutoff
        &MGRID
            NGRIDS 4
            CUTOFF 800
            REL_CUTOFF 40
        &END MGRID
        # Functional choice
        &XC
            &XC_FUNCTIONAL PBE
            &END XC_FUNCTIONAL
            DENSITY_CUTOFF      1e-10
            GRADIENT_CUTOFF     1e-10
            TAU_CUTOFF          1e-10
            # Grimme corrections
            &VDW_POTENTIAL
                POTENTIAL_TYPE  PAIR_POTENTIAL
                &PAIR_POTENTIAL
                    R_CUTOFF    16
                    TYPE        DFTD3
                    PARAMETER_FILE_NAME data/dftd3.dat
                    REFERENCE_FUNCTIONAL PBE
                    LONG_RANGE_CORRECTION T
                &END PAIR_POTENTIAL
            &END VDW_POTENTIAL
        &END XC
    &END DFT

    # Definition of the system
    &SUBSYS
        &CELL
             A     1.4981685526642668E+01    0.0000000000000000E+00    0.0000000000000000E+00
             B     0.0000000000000000E+00    1.2913890484543410E+01    0.0000000000000000E+00
             C     0.0000000000000000E+00    0.0000000000000000E+00    1.4487082026558507E+01
            MULTIPLE_UNIT_CELL  1 1 1
        &END CELL
        
# Definition of the system coordinates
        &COORD
C    8.9621061646027156E-01   -1.4333024249016569E-02    4.8005419345999556E-01
C    7.3027015077087953E-01    9.8944652932047919E-02    4.4632925005563073E-01

SCALED  T

        &END COORD

# Definition of the basis set and potential to use for all atoms
        &KIND C
            BASIS_SET DZVP-GTH-PBE
            POTENTIAL GTH-PBE-q4
        &END KIND
        &KIND H
            MASS 2.014101777
            BASIS_SET DZVP-GTH-PBE
            POTENTIAL GTH-PBE-q1
        &END KIND
        &KIND O
            BASIS_SET DZVP-GTH-PBE
            POTENTIAL GTH-PBE-q6
        &END KIND
        &TOPOLOGY
            NUMBER_OF_ATOMS  342
            MULTIPLE_UNIT_CELL  1 1 1
        &END TOPOLOGY
    &END SUBSYS
&END FORCE_EVAL

&MOTION
    &MD
        ENSEMBLE NVT
        &THERMOSTAT
            TYPE CSVR
            &CSVR
                TIMECON 1000
            &END CSVR
        &END THERMOSTAT
        TEMPERATURE 300
        STEPS 60000
        TIMESTEP 0.5
    &END MD
    # Simulation output
    &PRINT
        &RESTART
            FILENAME =${SYSNAME}.rst
            &EACH
                MD 10
            &END EACH
        &END RESTART
        &STRESS
            FILENAME =${SYSNAME}.stress
            &EACH
                MD 10
            &END EACH
        &END STRESS
        &TRAJECTORY
            FILENAME =${SYSNAME}.pos.xyz
            FORMAT XYZ
            UNIT angstrom
            &EACH
                MD 1
            &END EACH
        &END TRAJECTORY
        &VELOCITIES
            FILENAME =${SYSNAME}.vel.xyz
            FORMAT XYZ
            UNIT angstrom/fs
            &EACH
                MD 1
            &END EACH
        &END VELOCITIES
       &FORCES
            FILENAME =${SYSNAME}.frc.xyz
            FORMAT XYZ
            UNIT amu*angstrom/fs^2
            &EACH
                MD 1
            &END EACH
        &END FORCES
    &END PRINT
&END MOTION
